page.title: 06EMPLOYMENT:SWANSEA WEST
page.content: A survey at Parkland Primary School suggested that there was little unemployment in Sketty Park Estate. Many parents are involved in Education,from Nursery teachers to University professors. Most others are in professional employment or are self employed. The price of houses in the area means that people need a large salary to keep up their standard of living. In our class of 28 children only 5 were born in the area. the others moved into the area when their fathers gained promotion. Only a small proportion of children in our school have free school meals, but in the older council estates, such as Townhill, there is considerable unemployment and a large number of children there have free meals.
